official_title: A joint resolution entitled: "Rehabilitation of Structures for the Homeless".

summary.text: Requires the appropriation of funds authorized under the Housing and Urban-Rural Recovery Act of 1983 for the rehabilitation of structures for use as shelters for the homeless and for demonstration projects coordinating local efforts to assist families trying to locate affordable housing.

titles.title: A joint resolution entitled: "Rehabilitation of Structures for the Homeless".
